name: Future Past
description:
This game strives for classic rpg and dungeon-crawler elements for a great expirience that is dinamic and interesting.

The story accompanies a world where beigns that are evolved are zooantropomorphic, in an alternative cyberpunk world, where our main character is a thief for hire, a high-tech fox, is hired to steal an artifact. Little does he know that this artifact can change his world as he knows it...
